translation.en: [child, speaking Arabic] Mother?
Mother?
I had a nightmare.
I saw them shoot him, in the dream.
Mama, why did he die?
Because that is what's written in God's book -
Say, "Nothing shall befall us, except what God has ordained."
translation.ja: 〈“いかなる災いも 神のおぼしめしにすぎず”〉

translation.en: Did God not love him?
God loved him so much...
He took him sooner than we wanted.
translation.ja: 〈こんなに早く彼を 御許(みもと)に召されたのよ〉

translation.en: Does God love me that much?
Yes...
but God has a different plan for you.
translation.ja: 〈あなたには お役目があるの〉

translation.en: [child] How will I know?
[mother] He will reveal it to you when you're ready.
translation.ja: 〈その時が来れば 教えてくださる〉

translation.en: Mamma.
[woman, in English] US foreign policy has come under criticism once again
translation.ja: アメリカの外交政策が 批判されています

translation.en: with the resurgence of ISIL in Syria. Since allied forces left the region in 2019,
translation.ja: 2019年の米軍撤退を機に シリアでＩＳＩＬが台頭

translation.en: several cities have fallen to the caliphate in swift succession in its expansion south.
translation.ja: 複数の都市を支配下に収め 南部に勢力を拡大しています

translation.en: The city of Damascus has been under siege for months now,
translation.ja: ダマスカスは ＩＳＩＬに包囲され

translation.en: worsening the refugee crisis.
It seems nothing but an act of God can stop the ancient city from falling to the caliphate.
translation.ja: 奇跡でも起きなければ 首都陥落は必至でしょう

translation.en: [man yelling in Arabic] Today, God gives us Damascus!
Help us!
We're trapped!
Please let us out!
We'll die here!
Help us!
Let us out!
[man, in Arabic] Jibril? When did you escape?
translation.ja: 〈ジブリル いつ脱出した？〉

translation.en: Samer?
They said you joined the rebels. Your family was worried about you.
translation.ja: 〈反政府軍に入ったと 家族が心配してたよ〉

translation.en: Where's your family?
[man] Listen to me!
Listen to me, my brothers and sisters.
They pretend to preach God's word,
translation.ja: 〈彼らは神の言葉を 伝えるフリをして〉

translation.en: and all they do is twist its meaning.
translation.ja: 〈その意味を ねじ曲げている〉

translation.en: It is written in The Book. "They shall be held up to shame in this world...
translation.ja: 〈“彼らは 現世で屈辱を受け…”〉

translation.en: they have incurred God's most inexorable wrath... a shameful defeat awaits them!"
translation.ja: 〈“神の大いなる怒りを招き 恥ずべき懲罰を受ける”〉

translation.en: A defeat awaits you!
[in Farsi] May the Devil swallow you up!
I've looked the Devil in the eye. He cannot swallow me.
translation.ja: 〈私は悪魔と対峙(たいじ)したが のみ込まれなかった〉

translation.en: [in Arabic] It is written - Say, "Nothing shall befall us, except what God has ordained."
translation.ja: 〈“いかなる災いも 神のおぼしめしにすぎず”〉

translation.en: Say, "Nothing shall befall us, except what God has ordained."
translation.ja: 〈“いかなる災いも 神のおぼしめしにすぎず”〉

translation.en: [man] It is forbidden to misquote the scriptures!
translation.ja: 〈自分勝手に 聖典を引用するな〉

translation.en: [preacher] Look at you.
You've suffered more than anyone on this earth.
translation.ja: 〈地上で誰よりも 苦しめられている〉

translation.en: You're surrounded by enemies who want to eradicate you.
translation.ja: 〈あなた方の絶滅を望む敵に 囲まれている〉

translation.en: [man] Load the artillery! Quickly!
The sandstorm's upon us!
Believe me when I say God will defeat your enemies!
translation.ja: 〈皆を生かそうと 神が敵を撃退してくれよう〉

translation.en: Because God wants you to live.
Mark my words! On this day, mark my words!
translation.ja: 〈この日より 私の言葉を刻むがいい〉

translation.en: God's hand will turn them away!
Salvation is at hand!
Everybody, get inside!
Salvation is at hand!
There is nothing to be afraid of!
Heed my words!
This is their last gasp... ...their dying breath.
translation.ja: 〈これは 敵の最後のあがきだ〉

translation.en: [preacher] Mark my words...
the scale has tipped! History has ended!
translation.ja: 〈均衡は崩れ 歴史は終わった〉

translation.en: [newsreader] It lasted a record 43 days,
translation.ja: シリアで未曾有の砂嵐 未曽有の砂嵐が 43日間も続き

translation.en: a sandstorm of biblical proportions,
translation.ja: シリアで未曾有の砂嵐 未曽有の砂嵐が 43日間も続き 未曽有の砂嵐が 43日間も続き

translation.en: covering the city of Damascus in a blanket of dust.
translation.ja: ダマスカスを 覆いました

translation.en: The devastation is still untold.
Roads and motorways have been rendered inoperable,
the city's international airport closed for weeks, virtually stranding the city,
translation.ja: 空港は閉鎖され 街は孤立状態となり

translation.en: causing hundreds of businesses to shut down.
translation.ja: 経済活動が マヒしています

translation.en: -[crowd yelling] -But despite the catastrophe, there were celebrations across Damascus today,
translation.ja: しかし 市内は今日 歓喜に包まれました

translation.en: as ISIS militia finally withdrew troops
from their long-held position outside the ancient city,
translation.ja: １ヵ月にも及ぶ砂嵐で ＩＳＩＬが首都から 撤退したためです

translation.en: after the month-long sandstorm literally buried their ground forces,
translation.ja: ＩＳＩＬが首都から 撤退したためです 地上部隊が砂に埋まり

translation.en: cutting off the chain of supply.
translation.ja: 物流が 断たれたようです

translation.en: The White House announced today the end of ISIS as a threat in the Middle East.
translation.ja: ミリアム･キニーリー ＩＳＩＬの脅威は 去ったと米政府が発表

translation.en: This was ISIL's last stronghold in Syria after the resurgence of 2019,
translation.ja: ダニー･カルマニ 中東担当外務次官 ダニー･カルマニ 中東担当外務次官 シリア最後の拠点を 失ったＩＳＩＬは

translation.en: and this finally spells their end.
translation.ja: ダニー･カルマニ 中東担当外務次官 もう終わりです

translation.en: So, yes, we're very grateful for the weather.
translation.ja: 天候に感謝しています

translation.en: [Keneally] The president said he was hopeful this development would open up...
translation.ja: 大統領はこれにより新たな…

translation.en: All right, you can sit up -and get dressed now, Ms. Geller. -[sighs]
translation.ja: 着替えていいですよ ゲラーさん

translation.en: Has the doctor gone over everything with you?
Uh, yes.
You'll probably feel funny for the first few days--
I know. This isn't my first time.
-[sighs] -[phone alert]
translation.ja: “パパ: 結果はどうだった？”

translation.en: -[Ms. Geller] You're a philosophy major. -[man] Yes, ma'am.
[Ms. Geller] So, why do you wanna work for the CIA?
I think it's one of the most important jobs a person can have.
translation.ja: 非常に意義のある仕事ですし

translation.en: Keeping our country safe. Upholding its values.
translation.ja: 祖国とその理念を 守るためです

translation.en: What's a misconception that some people may have about you?
translation.ja: 人から 誤解されることはある？

translation.en: That I'm judgmental.
-So, you're not? -Not really.
translation.ja: 違う？ はい　私は他人を尊重します

translation.en: I accept all different kinds of people.
translation.ja: はい　私は他人を尊重します

translation.en: Would you accept a criminal?
If he'd served his time and was remorseful.
translation.ja: 刑に服し 反省してるなら

translation.en: -Would you trust him? -No.
Not with... everything.
What wouldn't you trust him with?
My family.
-A secret. -[beep]
[Ms. Geller] The truth?
Would you trust him to tell you the truth?
Well, the truth has many different versions. So it's hard to say.
translation.ja: 真実は多面的であり 一概には言えません

translation.en: The truth has many different versions?
The truth is pretty gray.
I'm gonna stop the interview there.
I know I shouldn't be telling you this, but I won't be recommending you.
translation.ja: 率直に言うわ あなたを推薦できない

translation.en: Uh, why not?
The CIA is like a holy order.
It's a doctrine that you live by.
People's lives depend on the decisions that we make, the actions that we take.
translation.ja: 我々の決定や言動には 人々の命が懸かってる

translation.en: When you're in the trenches, you need to know who your enemies are.
translation.ja: 敵を見極める必要がある

translation.en: The truth may look gray, but I assure you it is not.
translation.ja: 真実はグレーじゃない

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[chanting in Arabic] Messiah! Messiah!
Messiah! Messiah! Messiah!
[chanting] Messiah! Messiah!
[Jibril] Imam?
Where do you lead us, Imam?
To our destiny.
-[phone chimes] -[sighs]
Dad, what part of "I'm working" don't you understand?
translation.ja: パパ 仕事中だって 言ったでしょ

translation.en: Well, I was just wondering how it went today at the clinic.
translation.ja: 検査結果を知りたいだけだ

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. Just... just like last time.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　前回と同じ

translation.en: -What are you doing working? -Please, Dad.
translation.ja: 仕事は休め パパ　やめて

translation.en: No, you need your rest. You're not taking this seriously.
translation.ja: 休んだ方がいい 軽く考えちゃダメだ

translation.en: Of course I'm taking it seriously.
-I gotta go. -All right.
translation.ja: 〝Ｑ：回線を確保した〞 もう切るわ 分かったよ

translation.en: Get some sleep.
Good night.
I love you.
What do you got?
Rumor is he's from Egypt.
I listened to those other files. I'm hearing, uh, some other accent.
translation.ja: 音声を聞いたけど アクセントが違う

translation.en: Iranian, maybe, which likely means he's Shi'ite.
translation.ja: イラン人かも つまりシーア派ね

translation.en: He just led 2,000 Syrian Palestinians into the desert.
translation.ja: 2000人のパレスチナ人と 砂漠に向かった

translation.en: What's a Shi'ite doing leading a bunch of Sunnis?
translation.ja: スンニ派を引き連れて？

translation.en: Yeah, feels like trouble.
I'll put him on our watch list and get eyes on him in the morning.
translation.ja: 監視対象として 明日から追跡する

translation.en: -Thanks, Q. -Okay.
translation.ja: 監視対象として 明日から追跡する じゃあ

translation.en: [in Arabic] "If you look for truth, you may find comfort.
translation.ja: 〈“真実を求めれば 安らぎを得られる”〉

translation.en: If you look for comfort, you will never find truth."
translation.ja: 〈“安らぎを求めれば 真実は得られない”〉

translation.en: [man] Why do you quote an infidel?
Who are you to judge who's an infidel?
translation.ja: 〈異教徒か否か 誰が決める？〉

translation.en: -People are hungry, Imam. -Don't interrupt, boy.
translation.ja: 〈皆 空腹です〉 〈割り込むな〉

translation.en: Why do you call me Imam?
Because you are great.
No greater than you.
"There is no deity but God."
But you turned away evil as you said you would.
He turned away evil.
But He works through you.
"Did He create you in jest? Without purpose?"
translation.ja: 〈“神は戯れに 人を創られたのか？”〉

translation.en: You expect a shoemaker's son to know the scriptures?
translation.ja: 〈靴職人の子には 分かるまい〉

translation.en: Do you serve God?
Yes.
Then He works through you.
translation.ja: 〈ならば 神は君を通して働く〉

translation.en: He works through everyone.
You mean He works through all who righteously follow Islam.
translation.ja: 〈イスラムに従う者だけじゃ ないのか〉

translation.en: Don't tell me what I mean.
Why are there no women here?
Go find a woman... and give her your seat.
This man is the Devil.
He has led us into the desert with no food.
And to leave me now is to perish.
I'm here to tell you to throw away your assumptions about God.
translation.ja: 〈神に対する思い込みを 捨てよ〉

translation.en: Stop clinging to what you think you know.
translation.ja: 〈そんなものに すがってはならない〉

translation.en: In this hour, mankind is a rudderless boat.
translation.ja: 〈人類は 舵(かじ)を失ってしまった〉

translation.en: Cling to me.
-[waiter] Hey, we're closing in 20. -Already?
translation.ja: そろそろ閉店です もう？

translation.en: It's three a.m.
I'm sorry. Am I stopping you from getting home?
translation.ja: ごめんなさい 私のせいで帰れないわね

translation.en: It's my job. Gotta be here anyway.
translation.ja: 仕事なのでお構いなく

translation.en: The Clash of Civilizations. Samuel P. Huntington.
translation.ja: 「文明の衝突」 サミュエル･ハンチントンね

translation.en: How you finding it?
Dry.
Poli sci?
-Yeah. -Senior year?
When's your paper due?
Tomorrow.
The only thing you have to remember is that he was right.
Huntington predicted that the primary axis of world conflict after the Cold War would be along cultural and religious lines.
translation.ja: 冷戦後は 文化と宗教が 紛争の主軸になると予測した

translation.en: It's exactly what's happening in world politics today,
translation.ja: 今まさに起こってることよ

translation.en: so just... center your paper around that argument.
translation.ja: それを論点にしなさい

translation.en: -Uh... You teach? -No.
Just a nerd.
My boss calls you Ms. Night Owl.
I have a nickname?
I think he likes you.
I'm Eva.
Keon.
Nice to meet you, Keon.
translation.ja: よろしく キーオン

translation.en: Wait, so, what do you do... if you don't teach?
translation.ja: 先生じゃないなら あなたの職業は？

translation.en: I work in international relations.
That's what my uncle used to say.
He worked for the CIA.
-You a field agent? -I never said I worked for the CIA.
translation.ja: 捜査官？ ＣＩＡとは言ってない

translation.en: He died.
My uncle. In Turkey.
-[sighs] -Last year.
That bombing.
Terrible.
I'm sorry to hear that.
He was doing what... what he loved.
translation.ja: 叔父は仕事を愛してた

translation.en: [Samer, in Arabic] What is he doing?
[Jibril] Talking with God.
He looks crazy.
He stood for 30 days on the Gate of St. Thomas
translation.ja: 〈30日間 トマスの門に立ち〉

translation.en: and preached without food or water, during a sandstorm,
translation.ja: 〈水も食事も取らず 説教を続けた〉 〈砂嵐の間 僕たちが隠れていた時もだ〉

translation.en: while we hid in a building, fearing for our lives.
translation.ja: 〈砂嵐の間 僕たちが隠れていた時もだ〉

translation.en: You don't believe he really did that, do you?
translation.ja: 〈まさか 彼が砂嵐を起こしたと？〉

translation.en: He is Isa returned.
al-Masih.
[al-Masih] Jibril!
Sit down with me.
Do you know there is a star for every soul?
Do you believe me?
Yes.
Imam... is my mother in a good place?
translation.ja: 〈母は 幸せな所にいますか？〉

translation.en: She's where God wants her.
She is with Him?
Do you think... He would forsake a soul as good as hers?
translation.ja: 〈君の母のような善良な魂を 神が見捨てると思うか？〉

translation.en: I miss her.
I want to see her.
It's good you're thinking about the next life.
translation.ja: 〈来世を思うのは 良いことだ〉

translation.en: Why have you come now?
It's pointless to question these things.
I'm here... in this moment because I have always been here in this moment...
translation.ja: 〈私は常にここにいて 今もいるだけだ〉

translation.en: and so have you.
You have light in you, Jibril...
but God is going to ask some hard things of you.
translation.ja: 〈だが 神の試練が 待っている〉

translation.en: I am ready.
Pack up the camp. We're moving.
"Masih" in Arabic means "Messiah." [chanting] Messiah! Messiah!
translation.ja: “マスィーフ”は “メシア”を意味します

translation.en: So, this is a cult?
Possibly. ISIL use this type of apocalyptic propaganda all the time, and to good effect.
translation.ja: 啓示的なプロパガンダは ＩＳＩＬも使いましたが

translation.en: This guy's just taken it to the next level.
So, he's some rival faction? Al-Qaeda?
translation.ja: するとアルカイダとか？

translation.en: -We don't know who he's associated with. -What do we know about him?
translation.ja: 関連は不明です 経歴は？

translation.en: That's the concerning thing.
He's come out of nowhere and he's leading desperate people into the desert.
translation.ja: 急に現れ 砂漠へ行進しました

translation.en: To what end?
Well, if it's a cult, he could be leading them to their death.
Or he could be creating an army.
An army of sick and starving refugees?
translation.ja: 病気や飢えた難民を集めて？

translation.en: He's creating a cause, in the hope that other people will join him.
translation.ja: 共感を集めて 扇動する狙いです

translation.en: -That's a lot of speculation, Eva. -It's my job to speculate, ma'am.
translation.ja: ただの推測ね それが私の仕事です

translation.en: He has over 2,000 followers. What if he turns out to be another al-Baghdadi?
translation.ja: バグダディの再来に なりかねません

translation.en: I'd like to keep an eye on him.
Minimal resources.
Thank you, ma'am.
What do you have over Syria?
We'll lose range in about four minutes. What are we looking for, exactly?
translation.ja: ４分で圏外です 何を探せば？

translation.en: Can you zoom in on that?
Closer?
There we are.
They're nowhere near Damascus.
translation.ja: ダマスカスを離れてる

translation.en: [Eva] Where are we?
[technician] There's Damascus.
-And that's-- -Israel.
He's led us to our deaths.
He's led us into battle!
Collect all the weapons.
[Eva] Get me Director Bailey.
We need to get a message to that security post in Israel.
translation.ja: イスラエルにも連絡を

translation.en: Imam, what do you want us to do?
Dig a hole and bury them.
Then how do we fight?
[woman] Shit.
[man, in Hebrew] What?
We've got a crazy fucker.
Hello there, crazy fucker.
[in English] Oh, shit. Oh, shit, shit, shit, shit.
translation.ja: マジでヤバい 何よ？

translation.en: Fuck.
[man, in Hebrew] Patrol house 283ip. Repeat, 283ip. Request immediate reinforcement.
translation.ja: 〈こちら監視所318 大至急 増員を要請する〉

translation.en: [in Arabic] Be strong. God is with you.
translation.ja: 〈神は共にいる　強くあれ〉

translation.en: [in Hebrew] Hands up!
Hands away from your clothes!
[female soldier] Get down!
-[on radio] Hold fire! -Where the hell is reinforcement?
translation.ja: 〈発砲 待て〉 〈援軍は まだか？〉

translation.en: [in Hebrew] These people need food.
Lebanon is that way.
Lay down on the ground. I said lay down!
[male soldier] Hands up!
Stand down.
Arrest him.
[woman, in English] A dramatic arrest took place at the Israeli border...
translation.ja: イスラエル国境に 難民が押し寄せ

translation.en: [Arabic] The occupying forces have refused...
translation.ja: 〈大変な逮捕劇が ありました〉

translation.en: the Palestinian refugees entry back into their homeland,
translation.ja: 〈大変な逮捕劇が ありました〉 〈パレスチナ人の リーダーは…〉

translation.en: led by a man they call al-Masih.
translation.ja: 〈パレスチナ人の リーダーは…〉

translation.en: -[English] ...crowd was fired at... -...man from Lebanon...
translation.ja: レバノンとトルコは これに対し…

translation.en: -...Israelis to the Syrian border... -...so far refused the refugees passage,
translation.ja: イスラエルは通行を拒否し 軍を投入

translation.en: -criticised by Muslims worldwide... -...a caravan of asylum seekers...
translation.ja: イスラム世界が 非難を強めています

translation.en: [in English] As displaced Palestinians, they claim they are entitled passage into the West Bank as rightful citizens.
translation.ja: 難民はヨルダン川西岸に 行く権利を主張しています

translation.en: Okay, we'll go again.
And someone fix my hair. I look like Phil Spector.
translation.ja: その前に私の髪を直して

translation.en: Shit.
-[woman, in Hebrew] What are you doing? -What's it look like?
You can't just let yourself in.
I pay for this place.
There's my princess.
Daddy!
Let me look at you! I'm all sweaty.
translation.ja: 〈顔を見せて パパは汗臭いだろ〉

translation.en: You're supposed to call and let me know you're coming. They're the rules.
translation.ja: 〈来る時は 連絡する取り決めよ〉

translation.en: [in English] Fuck the rules.
[in English] Great way to talk around your daughter.
Oh, like she never heard that from you?
-Where are you going? -I need to take a shower.
translation.ja: どこ行くの？ シャワー

translation.en: [in Hebrew] This isn't a hotel.
Do you ever clean up?
[in English] Did you just come here to judge me? When are you going to move your shit out?
translation.ja: 文句を言う前に 荷物を持っていって

translation.en: ...arrested this morning, when attempting to cross the border. -He is being held in... -Hey.
translation.ja: 国境を越えようとして 逮捕されました

translation.en: -Hey. -What are you doing here?
-[phone rings] -I came to see Eli.
[in Hebrew] Oh, so you bothered this week?
[in Hebrew] Have you got a job yet?
[in English] My job is to look after our daughter. You should try it sometime.
translation.ja: 私の仕事は娘の世話よ

translation.en: Go get your coat, princess.
Hello.
Yeah? It's my day off.
When?
Okay.
[in English] Are you going to break her heart again?
REFUGEE LEADER ARRESTED
We'll eventually pull something on him, but it's gonna take time and resources.
translation.ja: 〝難民リーダー 逮捕〞 彼の素性を暴くには 手間が掛かる 彼の素性を暴くには 手間が掛かる

translation.en: The fastest way to get to know him is to meet him.
translation.ja: 実際に会うのが一番です

translation.en: He's not our detainee, so, for the moment, he's not our concern. Israel's handling it.
translation.ja: 彼を拘束したイスラエルに 任せておけばいい

translation.en: [Eva] I wouldn't underestimate this guy, sir. This wasn't just aimed at Israel.
translation.ja: 彼の目的は イスラエルだけじゃない

translation.en: He knows that America has to defend Israel's position,
and as long as those starving people sit at their border, the more indefensible that position becomes.
translation.ja: アメリカはイスラエルを 擁護しきれなくなります

translation.en: We'll get dragged into something we don't want.
Why don't you let the politicians worry about that?
translation.ja: それは政治家の仕事だ

translation.en: That wasn't very politic.
But it's the truth.
My God, you're like your father.
translation.ja: お父さん そっくり

translation.en: [in English] This is my day off.
I don't want you to waste my time, so it would be best if you just answer my questions.
translation.ja: 時間がもったいない 素直に答えろよ

translation.en: Why are you here?
[in English] To see the Holy Land.
Welcome to the Holy Land.
-So, I'm free to leave? -I ask the questions here.
translation.ja: 終わり？ 教えてくれ

translation.en: Who are you?
[in Hebrew] The Word.
[in English] Do you even know what that means?
translation.ja: 意味 分かってるか？

translation.en: -[in English] Yes. -Yes?
So, you are "the word"?
Okay, Mr. The Word, I don't care if you sit here and rot,
translation.ja: “御言葉”君 お前のせいで 時間を無駄にしたくない

translation.en: I just don't want you to waste my fucking time.
translation.ja: お前のせいで 時間を無駄にしたくない

translation.en: So, where did you learn all your Hebrew?
Here.
So, you're from here?
Originally.
From where? Ramat Gan? Jerusalem? Where?
translation.ja: ラマトガン？　エルサレム？

translation.en: -Why, you assume I'm Palestinian? -Oh, you're not?
translation.ja: パレスチナ人だと？ じゃあ ユダヤ人？

translation.en: -So, you're Jewish? -Originally.
translation.ja: じゃあ ユダヤ人？ もともとは

translation.en: Originally.
And now, you're what?
I'm with God.
God.
I don't see him.
You will.
Will I?
Why don't you take God and stick him up your fucking ass?
translation.ja: ケツの穴にでも突っ込んどけ

translation.en: What were you doing in Syria?
Delivering a message.
-A message from who? -My father.
And who is your father?
[in Hebrew] That will be revealed in time.
Why not save me the fucking suspense and just admit it now?
translation.ja: もったいぶらずに教えろ

translation.en: [in English] Because, Aviram, it's not time.
translation.ja: アヴィラム まだその時じゃない

translation.en: Who told you my name?
[in Hebrew] No one needed to tell me your name.
You are in my father's book.
Don't fuck with me.
[in English] Your anger is misplaced.
You don't want to know about my anger.
[in Hebrew] You hold onto hatred like it's a prize,
translation.ja: 〈君は勲章のように 憎しみを誇る〉

translation.en: when it's the weight around your neck.
translation.ja: 〈本当は 重荷でしかないのに〉

translation.en: [in English] You want to hurt me...
like they hurt you.
You talk a lot of shit.
You hurt a lot of people.
It's part of my job, yes.
You enjoy it.
I take pride in my work.
Except for that boy.
What boy?
The boy, in Megiddo.
Is that when you stopped believing?
translation.ja: 信仰はあの時 捨てた？

translation.en: I ask the questions here.
[in Hebrew] He is waiting for you, Aviram...
whenever you are ready.
DELETE FILE
[in Hebrew] Put him in the hole.
[in English] You look like shit.
[in Hebrew] Have you seen Omer?
[in Hebrew] Why would I do that?
Because he's your brother.
He did something stupid, I'm not going to take pity on him.
[sighs] I love your compassion.
The country's crumbling and he decides to rob a fucking store. He deserves what he gets.
translation.ja: 〈こんな時に強盗などして 自業自得だ〉

translation.en: [in English] What's up?
[in Hebrew] You're angrier than usual.
You...
You've never mentioned Megiddo to anyone?
Why would I do that?
Why are you even talking about it?
Nothing.
0% MATCH
-Hey, thief. Give it back. -[mutters]
Goodnight.
[Aviram, in English] You know how many times I've sat opposite that hood?
translation.ja: 俺が尋問した回数 知りたいか？

translation.en: [in English] 227.
And every time, it was me.
We could go on doing this forever, you know?
translation.ja: 永久に続けてもいいぞ

translation.en: It's up to you.
This is no solution.
Who are you?
The better question is...
who are you, Aviram Dahan?
translation.ja: 君こそ誰だ アヴィラム･ダハン？

translation.en: I'm the one asking the questions.
Are you?
